name: gatsby-source-wordpress-integration-tests
description: A simple Gatsby WP site for running integrations tests

scripts.test: npm run docker-clean-start && npm run run-jest && WARM_CACHE=true npm run run-jest
scripts.docker-clean-start: docker-compose stop && docker-compose rm -f && docker volume rm gatsby-source-wordpress_db_data gatsby-source-wordpress_wp_data &&  docker-compose pull && docker-compose build --no-cache --force-rm --pull && docker-compose up --build -d --force-recreate --always-recreate-deps --renew-anon-volumes --remove-orphans

author: Tyler Barnes <tylerdbarnes@gmail.com>
